tooltips.fix-invalid-tiles: Repair invalid tile identifiers in all tile layers by setting them to be empty
tooltips.pref-tile-width: The suggested tile width when creating maps
tooltips.pref-tile-height: The suggested tile height when creating maps
tooltips.command-capacity: The maximum amount of commands that will be stored on the undo stack
tooltips.restore-layout: Restore the previous layout of widgets at startup
tooltips.use-default-font: Use the built-in bitmap font (only supports one size)
tooltips.pref-format: The save file format used if no file extension is specified when saving maps
tooltips.embed-tilesets: Embed tileset data in map files
tooltips.indent-output: Controls whether save files are indented
tooltips.fold-tile-data: Make tile layer data easier for humans to edit, at the expense of space
tooltips.repository-link: Open the GitHub repository in your browser

misc.name: Name
misc.license-info: This tool is open-source software, using the GPL v3.0 license.
misc.credits-info: Tactile is developed using the following open-source libraries.
misc.create-tileset-instruction: Select an image which contains the tiles aligned in a grid.
misc.map-parse-error: Oops, something went wrong when parsing the map!

parse-errors.none: Nothing went wrong, please consider submitting a bug report
parse-errors.unsupported-map-format: The map uses an unsupported file format
parse-errors.unsupported-map-orientation: The map uses an unsupported tile orientation
parse-errors.no-map-width: The map has no width attribute
parse-errors.no-map-height: The map has no height attribute
parse-errors.no-map-tile-width: The map has no tile width attribute
parse-errors.no-map-tile-height: The map has no tile height attribute
parse-errors.no-next-layer-id: The map has no next layer identifier attribute
parse-errors.no-next-object-id: The map has no next object identifier attribute
parse-errors.invalid-layer-type: At least one layer has an unsupported type
parse-errors.no-layer-type: At least one layer has no type attribute
parse-errors.no-tile-layer-data: At least one tile layer has no tile data
parse-errors.corrupt-tile-layer-data: At least one tile layer has corrupt tile data
parse-errors.unsupported-tile-layer-encoding: At least one tile layer uses an unsupported tile encoding
parse-errors.external-tileset-does-not-exist: At least one referenced external tileset does not exist
parse-errors.unknown-external-tileset-error: Something went wrong trying to read an external tileset
parse-errors.no-first-tileset-tile-id: At least one tileset has no first tile attribute
parse-errors.no-tileset-tile-width: At least one tileset has no tile width attribute
parse-errors.no-tileset-tile-height: At least one tileset has no tile height attribute
parse-errors.no-tileset-name: At least one tileset has no name attribute
parse-errors.no-tileset-image-path: At least one tileset has no image path attribute
parse-errors.no-tileset-image-width: At least one tileset has no image width attribute
parse-errors.no-tileset-image-height: At least one tileset has no image height attribute
parse-errors.no-tileset-tile-count: At least one tileset has no tile count attribute
parse-errors.no-tileset-column-count: At least one tileset has no column count attribute
parse-errors.no-tileset-version: At least one tileset has no version attribute
parse-errors.no-external-tileset-source: At least one referenced tileset is missing a source path attribute
parse-errors.tileset-image-does-not-exist: At least one referenced tileset image does not exist
parse-errors.unsupported-tileset-version: At least one tileset uses an unsupported format version
parse-errors.corrupt-property-value: At least one property value is invalid
parse-errors.no-property-name: At least one property has no name
parse-errors.no-property-type: At least one property has no type
parse-errors.unsupported-property-type: At least one property has an unsupported type
parse-errors.comp-def-no-name: At least one component definition has no name
parse-errors.comp-def-no-attr-name: At least one component definition attribute has no name
parse-errors.comp-def-no-attr-type: At least one component definition attribute has no type
parse-errors.comp-def-unsupported-attr-type: At least one component definition attribute has an unsupported type
parse-errors.comp-def-corrupt-attr-value: At least one component definition attribute has an unsupported value
parse-errors.no-component-type: At least one component instance has no type
parse-errors.no-component-attr-name: At least one component instance attribute has no name
parse-errors.no-component-attr-value: At least one component instance attribute has no value
parse-errors.corrupt-component-attr-value: At least one component instance attribute has an invalid value
parse-errors.no-object-id: At least one object has no identifier attribute
parse-errors.no-object-type: At least one object has no type
parse-errors.unsupported-object-type: At least one object is of an unsupported type
parse-errors.tile-def-no-id: At least one tile definition is missing a tile identifier
parse-errors.tile-def-no-anim-frame-tile: At least one tile definition has an animation frame with associated tile
parse-errors.tile-def-no-anim-frame-duration: At least one tile definition has an animation frame with no duration
